name: Jason Momoa
description: Shahid is an exellent Guide and travel companion. Went with Hiking with him. We explore various routes and discovered the beauty of nature. Definitely will go on another adventure with him soon

name: Megan Fox
description: I like to solo travel and go on Adventure. One of my friend recommended him so i booked  him for my next Adventure. He was so awesome and co operative. we had a blast. It was a memorable journey .

name: Bear Grylls
description: I was always interested in deep sea diving but always scared. But on a dare i contacted Shahid for a deep sea diving. He definitely knows what he is doing. He is very careful about safety too.
